text: St. John's International Airport is 3 nautical miles (5.6 km) northwest of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada. The airport is part of the National Airports System, and is operated by St. John's International Airport Authority Inc. ==References== ==Other websites== * St. John's International Airport Authority Category:Airports in Canada Category:St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
title: St. John's International Airport
